title: Seedy
description:
Jake Hart, Cathy Smith and Brian Cirmo share stories from the seedier side.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Brian Cirmo, The War on Drugs, Cathy Smith, Jake Hart, Mr Little Jeans, Lee Rosevere, Kevin Allison)
